title: Crazy Lag spike *HELP*
body: Hmm.. I got this new router Linksys AC1200+ but I'm unsure what may be causing my lag spike to hit 1500ms in one line. Been getting it... but when I use ethernet Cat5e lan cable it seems to be running really smooth? I dont get it, no spikes at all.. Or something about the wifi radio signal causing it to do that? Could it be that my laptops wireless card is dying? no idea but just guessing... that spike really bothers me during game because when In a team fight or an initiate and my champion just starts walking forward or just auto them lol..

replies.body: Lag spikes can be caused by a variety of issues ranging from network problems reaching the game server, or packet loss due to how your ISP is routing to us.  I recommend going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in good health.  The traceroute you provided is alright, but doesn't provided specific information to see how you're routing.  For that I recommend reach that IP through the [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)tool which will tell us what nodes you are visiting to get to us.  Hope that helps!

Hmm... im on my modem now and I think its only to the server and not my connection at all.. the server is giving me time outs now..I think it has gotten worse.. any idea how to fix this? it might be server connection towards my ISP.. no idea how to fix this :'(.. Im using Docomo Pacific Guam
http://puu.sh/rE45P/f5c4e69e68.png


this is my modem
http://puu.sh/rE47y/342c1ff0dd.png

That is some ping, my friend!  Was the connection guide able to help at all?  Make sure to go through each step there to rule out any possibilities.  I don't have any recommendations about your router, but I suggest downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help make sure your firewall settings are automatically configured to maintain access.  Let me know!

Do you think I should change anything from this menu on my router?
http://puu.sh/rC8cx/666d2149e7.png
